reviews.text: We went for dinner on Saturday night to Roslin's. The food was excellent and the staff very attentive. Jorge, the Manager, runs the restaurant very efficiently and has a great team of staff behind him. The setting is really nice and there is a lovely ambience. We have been going to this restaurant for quite some time and never fail to be impressed each time we visit. We really do feel that this is a great alternative for us as normally we head to London for a special meal. There is so much variety on the menu and there is also a very good drinks menu to choose from and the prices are very reasonable. We look forward to returning in the very near future. Thank you for another wonderful evening.
reviews.title: ANOTHER WONDERFUL DINING EXPERIENCE AT ROSLIN'S

reviews.text: Our party enjoyed a delightful New Year's Eve lunch with near perfect service from two very helpful waitresses. The restaurant (and the hotel) had been tastefully decorated for Christmas and New Year and everyone seemed to be in the right mood for celebrating. When we booked, we were advised that staff would be busy from 5pm preparing the room for the evening festivities but although we were still there well after this time, we were not pressured to move.
reviews.title: A fabulous New Year lunch

reviews.text: The lunch menu provided a good range of meat, fish and veg dishes with a claim that ingredients are all sourced locally. Our favourite dish was the crab and prawn soup - superb.
reviews.title: Peter1
Don't visit if you don't like dogs or you're a vegetarian.
reviews.text: I am surprised at some of the negative comments about the attitude of hotel/restaurant staff. I don't know if it was New Year but everyone in our party thought that the service was outstanding with very friendly and happy staff.

reviews.title: Stayed and dined here with two children - great.
reviews.text: A lovely lunch which set us up nicely for the evening's festivities.

The Roslin Beach Hotel has a wonderful view of the sea and the huge windows and seaside decor add to the enjoyment. The service was outstanding at all times. The menu had a lot of choice, unusual for Sunday lunch, all the roasts you would expect plus a few other dishes including fish of the day and vegetarian. The roasts come with beautiful puffy yorkies and lots of fresh vegetables. my other half's fish came with a beautifully dressed salad. There is a lot of choice for desserts too, including the famous Rossi ice cream and a delectably light sponge pudding. For three courses plus a little smoked duck appetiser you pay £24.50 which is amazing value. We will be coming again!
reviews.title: Easy like a Sunday!

reviews.text: I have to say having been lucky enough to saty in some great establishments over the years and being local to the Roslin its a pleasure to report such good things.
reviews.title: Restaurant & Hotel Stay

reviews.text: The restaurant has great ambience and the staff are of a very high standard. The food is also always of a great quality and much of the produce locally sourced.
reviews.title: Excellent location with good sea views

reviews.text: The rooms also are well priced for this star rating and of a great standard.
reviews.title: the mayors charity breakfast

reviews.text: Finally just to show the level of first class service I had the pleasure of one of the directors giving me personnel touch at lunch recently asking about our stay, food and any comments I wished to pass on so they could improve any areas.
reviews.title: Disappointing

reviews.text: Four of us went to the Roslin for afternoon tea and I have to say, we were not disappointed! What a delight! Lovely selection of cakes, sandwiches and a warm savoury tartlet - that little extra touch! Tea and coffe was replenished regularly and the staff were very attentive.
reviews.title: Afternoon delight!
Great setting, good specials and good service.
reviews.text: Our table was by the window so we had a lovely view of the sea! We sat at our table for nearly two hours!!! Yes, that is how long it took us to enjoy every mouthful! Will definately be going again!
Oh and in case you are wondering it was only £14.95 per person (plus 10% service charge)
reviews.title: Very busy place...........

reviews.text: We visited the Roslin for lunch and the service atmosphere and view were fantastic. Menu very good although very fishy, so if like my wife you don't eat fish - menu may be a touch limited.
reviews.title: Wonderful setting overlooking sea and great fish
Poshest Place in Town
reviews.text: The sea trout and risotto were sublime - absolutely delicious. My wife's lamb ( not the special ) was average - but looking at other diners the lamb special looked far better. The child's fish and chips was disappointing. We found bones in the filet of fish and the chips seemed overcooked. However they were great about the feedback and seemed to welcome it- and refund the child meal and advised they would be changing the child's fish product. Fantastic.

reviews.title: Excellent food and services
reviews.text: Went to this restaurant with my best mate as the finale of my recent stay in UK. I found the food was very tasty especially the sea food platter which is cooked to perfection. Also the service was very attentive. Overall i would say 85 out of 100.

reviews.title: Christmas party
reviews.text: Only one downside is the men's toilet can be much better.

reviews.title: over crowded
reviews.text: Our club had our christmas party here this year, My wife and I have eaten here before and it's lovely, but I wouldn't return for a party on this scale with mass catering. food was bland, main course a beef bourgenion was over seasoned and a tiny little portion compared to the turkey roast. Desert was okay but can't even remember what it was. My wifes seabass was okay but her creme brulee was not nice at all. lively disco was going on in other room but area was too small with so many tables set up and people there.
I wouldn't return for a party but for a normal meal yes I'd go back.
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.text: we were packed into the conservatory like sardines and thought the food was only ok whole table had to move for people to go to toilet we had to many people in a confined space
reviews.title: Faultless
